participant_2.background:
I recently left my job after three years to travel the world.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, where I learned to love ice cream.
I have been learning more about the business through my parents and have been taking on more responsibilities.
my favorite food is salad.
My parents were immigrants from Italy.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there! How are you?
I am doing well! Just got back from a long day of work. What about you?
I am doing well too! I recently left my job after three years to travel the world.
That sounds amazing! I am so jealous. I wish I could travel the world.
It is definitely an amazing experience. I have been to so many different countries and met so many different people.
That is awesome! I have always wanted to visit Italy.
My parents are immigrants from Italy, so I have been there a few times. It is a beautiful country.
I bet it is. I have heard great things about it.
It is definitely worth a visit.
I will have to put it on my list of places to visit.
You should! I am sure you would love it.
I am sure I would.
So, what do you do for work?
I was a computer programmer before I started my own business.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of business do you have?
I am a personal trainer.
Oh, that's awesome! I have always wanted to be a personal trainer.
It is a great job! I love helping people reach their fitness goals.
I bet it is. I would love to be able to help people.
You should look into it! It is a lot of fun.
I will!
Awesome!
